solution_line_template: There were {multiplier_first_day}*{second_day_count} = <<{multiplier_first_day}*{second_day_count}={first_day_count}>>{first_day_count} people at the counting station who were counted on the first day.
In the two days, {first_day_count}+{second_day_count} = <<{first_day_count}+{second_day_count}={total_count}>>{total_count} were counted at the station.
